resources.string: If you don\'t have any figures to place and your pieces count = 3 you can fly (move to any empty place)
Circle at the top shows how many piece you can place you have
Possible moves are highlighted when you have selected a piece to move
Circle size shows whose turn it is
If you have less than 3 pieces (including the ones you can place) you lose
If you don\'t have any figures to place and your pieces count > 3 you can move to the next cell (if it is empty)
